text: @JoeBiden Biden is waiting for his photo op next wk at the Floyd funeral in Tex. I guess the Covid-19 social distancing and Dem state lockdowns was a bunch 💩.  Remember that churches weren't allow to have services for fear of Covid-19 but, it's okay for Dems trying to get the black vote.
